metadata.Name: RuBQ
metadata.Description: RuBQ is a Russian dataset for question answering over Wikidata. It contains 10k question-answer pairs, where questions are in Russian and answers are entities from Wikidata.
metadata.Paper Title: RuBQ: A Russian Dataset for Question Answering over Wikidata
metadata.Abstract: We present RuBQ, a new Russian dataset for question answering over Wikidata. The dataset consists of 10k question-answer pairs, where questions are in Russian and answers are entities from Wikidata. We provide a detailed description of the dataset creation process, including the data collection, annotation, and quality control procedures. We also present baseline results on the RuBQ dataset using several state-of-the-art question answering models. The dataset is publicly available for research purposes.
